attributes.review:
I wanted to get this app to show my support against the weird curry munchers that are slowly taking over the tech sector of this great and all powerful country before this app had the audacity to tell me I live in a house full of brown people. I have never been more insulted or gaslighted. My family is a beautiful group of aryans who just happen to have a spray-tanning addiction. As well as what they call â€œSweet Home Alabama Syndrome.â€
This app kept telling me to take pictures of myself for my â€œprofileâ€ but it had weird requests like â€œshow only your bare feetâ€ and â€œmake sure your gluteals are in full viewâ€. It also asked me if I was legal. I hope you know, pre-marital hand-holding is against the law and in the eyes of God, you are a sinner. Unfortunately, according to my niece, â€œif you donâ€™t sin, Jesus died for nothing.â€ 
When I tried sending our glorious president a message of support, the app told me it couldnâ€™t submit, because I didnâ€™t, â€œuse the required amount of ethnic and homophobic slurs.â€ Which is strange, considering my message had almost 40 of them. And whenever I tried to upload my Blood Drop Cross for a profile picture, it kept editing it into a police badge. I understand the reasoning obviously, but I thought this app was supposed to be a safe space.
I hope the developers consider fixing the bugs and rereleasing the app. Or itâ€™s a pathetic insult to Amerikkka, the great nation we live in.

attributes.review: I opened the app and was so excited to help our incredible president make America great again, so you can imagine my disappointment when it turned out to be a complete disaster. As soon as it finished loading, a warning popped up telling me all the money had been drained from my bank account and it thanked me for donating to the Trump campaign. Now I would gladly donate to the campaign of the greatest president this country has ever seen, but they took everything. I canâ€™t even afford to feed my kids. Needless to say I was a little panicky, so I called my bank and they said I had nothing left and that they couldnâ€™t help me because I had â€œwillinglyâ€ turned over all my money. I canâ€™t believe the people on Trumpâ€™s campaign team would do this to the very fine people that support him.
